Class LobbyControllerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.controller.LobbyControllerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LobbyController, TimerListener, UserListener

    public class LobbyControllerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements LobbyController, TimerListener, UserListener

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean acceptsNewUsers()
      Returns whether the lobby controller accepts new users, according to its state.
      void addUser(User user)
      Adds the user to the managed lobby.
      void endGame()
      Ends the game and disconnects all the users in the lobby.
      Config getConfig()
      Returns the configuration object used by the lobby controller to parameters such as timer length and bounds for number of players.
      Lobby getLobby()
      The lobby object managed by this controller.
      TimerListener getTimerListener()
      Returns the timer listener awaiting for the lobby timer countdown events associated to the managed lobby.

      Removes the user from the managed lobby.
      void startGame()
      Starts the game in the lobby managed by this controller, according to the associated configuration file.

      The listened timer has been aborted through Timer#abort().
      void timerDidFinish()
      The listened timer hss finished its countdown.

      The listened timer has sent a timer tick to update the current state of the timer.
      void timerWillStart(int secondsLeft)
      The listened timer has started its countdown
      void userDidChangeConnection(User user, UserConnection oldConnection, UserConnection newConnection)
      Notifies that the given user has switched from the oldConnection to the newConnection.
      void userDidChangeName(User user, java.lang.String name)
      Notifies that the given user has changed name.

      • addUser

        public void addUser(User user)
        Description copied from interface: LobbyController
        Adds the user to the managed lobby. The state of the lobby may change properly according to the new number of users. Also all the users in the lobby will be notified of the new user.
        Specified by:
        addUser in interface LobbyController

      • removeUser

        public void removeUser(User user)
        Description copied from interface: LobbyController
        Removes the user from the managed lobby. The state of the lobby may change properly according to the new number of users. Also all the users in the lobby will be notified of the change.
        Specified by:
        removeUser in interface LobbyController
